titles.title: To authorize and request the President to award the Medal of Honor to Joseph T. Getherall, of Hacienda Heights, California, for acts of valor in the Republic of Vietnam on December 22, 1966, while serving in the Marine Corps during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 2/8/2007--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to award the Medal of Honor to Joseph T. Getherall of Hacienda Heights, California, for acts of valor on December 22, 1966, while serving in the Marine Corps during the Vietnam War.
